subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Suzuki, 42, is closing in on the 3,000-hit mark in the major leagues, and he has begun suggesting (perhaps playfully) that he can play until he is 50.
snippet: Suzuki, 42, is closing in on the 3,000-hit mark in the major leagues, and he has begun suggesting (perhaps playfully) that he can play until he is 50.
